languages.text: "Император, услышь мою клятву! Я буду лить кровь свою и не исцелю ран, пока не изничтожу скверну, запятнавшую мой корабль!"
"Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood, nor stop to heal my wounds, until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"
languages.original_text: "Император, услышь мою клятву! Я буду лить кровь свою и не исцелю ран, пока не изничтожу скверну, запятнавшую мой корабль!"

"Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood and not stop to heal my wounds until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"

"Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood, nor stop to heal my wounds, until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"

languages.text: "Imperator, hört meinen Schwur! Ich werde weiter mein Blut vergießen und nicht innehalten, um meine Wunden zu versorgen, bis die Verderbnis vernichtet ist, die mein Schiff befallen hat!"
languages.original_text: "Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood, nor stop to heal my wounds, until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: "Imperator, hört meinen Schwur! Ich werde weiter mein Blut vergießen und nicht innehalten, um meine Wunden zu versorgen, bis die Verderbnis vernichtet ist, die mein Schiff befallen hat!"

languages.text: « Ô, Empereur, entendez mon serment ! Je continuerai à verser le sang et j'ignorerai mes blessures tant que je n'aurai pas débarrassé mon vaisseau de la corruption qui le souille ! »
languages.original_text: "Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood, nor stop to heal my wounds, until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: « Ô, Empereur, entendez mon serment ! Je continuerai à verser le sang et j'ignorerai mes blessures tant que je n'aurai pas débarrassé mon vaisseau de la corruption qui le souille ! »

languages.text: «¡Emperador, escucha mi juramento! ¡Seguiré derramando mi propia sangre y no me detendré a restañar mis heridas hasta haber erradicado por completo la corrupción que infesta mi nave!».
languages.original_text: "Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood, nor stop to heal my wounds, until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Emperador, escucha mi juramento! ¡Seguiré derramando mi propia sangre y no me detendré a restañar mis heridas hasta haber erradicado por completo la corrupción que infesta mi nave!».

languages.text: 「皇帝よ、我が誓いを聞け！私の船を汚した腐敗が滅びるまで、私は血を流し続け、傷を癒すために止まることはしない！」
languages.original_text: "Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood, nor stop to heal my wounds, until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝よ、我が誓いを聞け！私の船を汚した腐敗が滅びるまで、私は血を流し続け、傷を癒すために止まることはしない！」

languages.text: “帝皇在上，聆听我的誓言吧！让我继续流血吧！我绝不会停下来包扎伤口，直到我将玷污飞船的腐化彻底消灭为止！”
languages.original_text: "Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood, nor stop to heal my wounds, until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇在上，聆听我的誓言吧！让我继续流血吧！我绝不会停下来包扎伤口，直到我将玷污飞船的腐化彻底消灭为止！”

languages.text: "İmparator, yeminimi duy! Gemime musallat olan bu yozluk yok edilene dek kanımı esirgemeyecek, yaralarımı sarmak için dahi durmayacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Emperor, hear my vow! I will continue to spill my blood, nor stop to heal my wounds, until the corruption that has befouled my ship is destroyed!"
